Articles.Content:
I'm starting a new modded install, and in trying to get it to work I've been getting the same error at different stages. I've gotten it a couple of times in loading the game, and two more times loading the new save. The error.log states that the problem is " KSP.exe has caused an Access Violation." Am I overflowing my computer's stacks? Do I need to reduce the number of mods, or close background programs? 

 

(RESOLVED) I've fixed it

Edited February 13, 2018 by tiki1116
Resolved
